name: fileSetLastModified
description: Sets the date when an on-disk or in-memory file was most recently modified.

params.name: filePath
params.description: An absolute path to an on-disk or in-memory file on the server

params.name: date
params.description: The date to set for when the file was last modified

examples.title: Script Syntax
examples.code:
<cfscript> 
 fileSetLastModified("c:	emp	est1.txt", "#now()#"); 
    writeOutput(#getFileInfo("c:	emp	est1.txt").lastmodified#); 
 </cfscript>
